chapter.title: Running a @umbrella.product.name@
chapter.para: After installing the Tools from the update site outlined in the previous section, you will be able to configure an instance of the @umbrella.product.name.short@ inside Eclipse.

To do so bring up the WTP Servers view (i.e.,
Window Show View Other Server Servers
). You can now right-click in the view and select "
New Server
". This will bring up a "New Server" dialog. Select @umbrella.product.name.short@ in the "@runtime.category@" category and click " Next ".
After finishing the wizard you should see a @umbrella.product.name.short@ for the relevant server type in the Servers view.
To start, stop, and debug the created @product.instance@ use the toolbar or the context menu actions of the Servers view.
